usg: Use to set the direction of the text content in the element.

vals.desc: Left to right and is to be used for languages that are written from the left to the right (like English)
Right to left and is to be used for languages that are written from the right to the left (like Arabic)

Text direction will be decided by browser. It uses a basic algorithm as it parses the characters inside the element until it finds a character with a strong directionality, then apply that directionality to the whole element
